title: PBE Unknown Store Error
body: ok so I just recovered my pbe account havnt been on it in years and I have around 1mill rp and ip and I try buying champs and it says unknown error and loot is super buggy cant do much need to buy champs and skins to test but cant help pls

replies.body: The server just went down for maintenance, for approx 2 hours per the [status page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).  If it's still an issue when it returns, you should report it over at the [PBE Boards ](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/)to have it looked into.  Thanks for the report!
